verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7699'>قْ</tajweed>رَأْ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13285'>ٱ</tajweed>سْمِ رَبِّكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14559'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى خَلَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ق</tajweed>َ
verses.translation: Читай (и возгласи)! Во имя Бога твоего, Кто сотворил

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: خَلَقَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7324'>ٱ</tajweed>لْإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':5969'>نس</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نَ مِنْ عَلَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ق</tajweed>ٍ

ٱ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7699'>قْ</tajweed>رَأْ وَرَبُّكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14560'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَكْرَمُ
ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14561'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَلَمِ
verses.translation: Он - Тот, Кто (человеку дал) перо и научил письму

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: عَلَّمَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14562'>ٱ</tajweed>لْإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':5969'>نس</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ
verses.translation: А также обучил тому, что он не знал

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كَلّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7137'>ٱ</tajweed>لْإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':5969'>نس</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نَ لَيَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14563'>طْ</tajweed>غَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Но нет же! Преступает все пределы человек

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14564'>َن ر</tajweed>َّءَاهُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14565'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَغْنَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Себе приписывая все, чем он богат и знатен

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14566'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رُّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14567'>جْ</tajweed>عَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Ведь к Господу вернется все, что суще

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَرَءَيْتَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14568'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى يَنْهَىٰ
verses.translation: Видал ли ты того, кто воспрещает

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: عَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':3317'>بْ</tajweed>دًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰٓ

أَرَءَيْتَ إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2594'>ن ك</tajweed>َانَ عَلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4019'>ٱ</tajweed>لْهُدَىٰٓ
verses.translation: И знаешь ты, стоит ли он на праведном пути

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَوْ أَمَرَ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14569'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>تَّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14569'>قْ</tajweed>وَىٰٓ
أَرَءَيْتَ إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14570'>ن ك</tajweed>َذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ
verses.translation: Видал ли ты, он истину отверг и отвернулся

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَلَمْ يَعْل<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':14571'>َم ب</tajweed>ِأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':897'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهَ يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: Неужто Он не знает, что Аллах всевидящ

verses.text_uthmani: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كَلَّا لَئ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4195'>ِن ل</tajweed>َّمْ يَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':10891'>نت</tajweed>َهِ لَنَسْفَع<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':14572'>َۢا ب</tajweed>ِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14573'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َاصِيَةِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Kallā la'il lam yantah(i), lanasfa'am bin-nāṣiyah(ti).
verses.translation: Но если он не прекратит (все это), За волосы чела Мы (оскорбительно) его потянем

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: نَاصِيَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14574'>ةٍ ك</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍ
فَلْيَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14575'>دْ</tajweed>عُ نَادِيَهُۥ
verses.translation: Пусть он тогда своих друзей (на помощь) призовет

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: سَنَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14576'>دْ</tajweed>عُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14577'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>زَّبَانِيَةَ
verses.translation: Мы ж созовем Своих блюстителей порядка

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعْهُ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14578'>ٱ</tajweed>سْجُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14578'>دْ</tajweed> وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14579'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14579'>قْ</tajweed>تَرِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ب</tajweed> ۩
verses.translation: Не внемли же ему, (о Мухаммад!), А преклони (колени перед Богом) И ближе подойди к Нему
